Package  Class  Tree  Deprecated  Index  Help 
 PREV PACKAGE   NEXT PACKAGE FRAMES    NO FRAMES    

Package org.haldean.chopper.server

Interface Summary
Callback An interface to provide a generic callback for when actions are completed.
Updatable An interface for classes that need to be periodically updated
 

Class Summary
AccelerationComponent A component to represent the different axes of acceleration
DataReceiver A huge singleton class to receive data from the chopper that operates within its own thread
Debug A class to write debug information to an updatable, and optionally to write it to standard error
EchoUpdatable An Updatable to write everything to standard error
GraphComponent A class which draws a graph based on a series of given result sets.
ImageComponent A component to display images
ImagePanel A component to show an image along with image quality controls
ImageReceiver A thread to receive an image from an ObjectInputStream and send that image to an ImageComponent
Orientation A class to represent the chopper's orientation
OrientationComponent A component that uses Java3D to display a 3D rendering of the current orientation of the chopper
PadController A thread to take input from a game pad and cue various events in the UI
SensorComponent A component to display graphs of on-board sensors
SensorParser This takes the sensor messages from the DataReceiver and parses it, notifying the appropriate components with the new data
ServerHost The superclass! This is the frame that encompasses everything else.
StatusLabel A component to display the status of various mission-critical system components
TiltComponent A component to show the orientation in three axes of the chopper
UpdatableTextArea A component that contains a TextArea that can be updated
WorldWindComponent A component that shows a globe with the chopper's path, along with some basic following and location-setting controls
